caption: I'm going to keep it real. This place has some of the best food but Mo can't stay still and made one of the best burgers I've had in NYC and in the country( I've been to more than 30 states). I Felt like Kenan when he tasted Ed's burger in the film good burger. Definitely have to stop by again and again.

Amazing Food & Hospitality! Tried There Chapli Kabab Burgers, Afghan Dumplings & Chicken Korma Platter. All was fresh & Delicious. Really recommend this place. All halal and Tasty. The owner was very cool and welcoming. Also they sell fresh naan!

This place is a hidden gem. Recently opened during e COVID-19 pandemic, it is strictly a takeout place (think a food truck without wheels) that also has delivery through the most popular channels.  Specializing in Afghan dishes, Mo & Ari …

Wow! This place has the MOST AMAZING burger! Juicy, spicy and even slightly crispy.   The experience was over way too fast! This is definitely a must try for anyone who finds himself in the neighborhood!

Wow! This place has THE BEST burger I've EVER tasted in my life! Juicy and spicy and even a little crispy. Absolutely amazing! This is definitely something you've got to try if you're anywhere nearby.
